Well, this place ain't half bad.
Naturally. I'm the ruler here after all.
You won't mind me staying here too?
I would be honored.
I mind. We don't really have a room for guests.
Hmm... That's a shame. Say, Arron, you have a nice, big bed.
Isn't it a Mayor's responsibility to provide guests with a sleeping place?
I would love to know you better while you are short on rooms for guests.
NO!
Hm? Why are you against it?
Because... Guests shouldn't be bothered by others as they sleep. I can sleep in Master's bed and you take mine.
Eeeh? But I don't wanna sleep alone.
Well, if you don't want to get separated from Arron, why don't we all sleep together?
(As appealing as it may sound, I'm afraid this might end up in a disaster. Rose seems quite serious about this. )
Alright, calm down you two, I believe we have some additional space in the attic.
Hmm... Fine, but leave your door unlocked. I might want to visit if I get bored.
Sigh. You are still going at it?
